history.title: History of Salymbekov University
history.subtitle: Journey of excellence in education and innovation since our foundation
history.aboutText1: Salymbekov University has been a beacon of knowledge and innovation, shaping future leaders through cutting-edge education and research.
history.aboutText2: Our commitment to academic excellence and practical skills development has made us one of the leading educational institutions in the region.

history.founderText1: Our founder's vision and dedication have been the driving force behind the university's success and growth.
history.founderText2: His commitment to education and innovation continues to inspire our community and shape our future direction.
history.founderQuote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. We are committed to creating leaders who will shape tomorrow.
history.gallerySubtitle: Capturing moments from our incredible journey

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Shaping the future through innovative education and research

missionContent.title: Our Mission
missionContent.text1: To provide high-quality education that empowers students to become innovative leaders and responsible global citizens through cutting-edge research and practical learning experiences.
missionContent.text2: We are committed to creating an inclusive learning environment that fosters critical thinking, creativity, and lifelong learning while addressing the challenges of our rapidly changing world.

visionContent.title: Our Vision
visionContent.text1: To be a globally recognized center of excellence in education and research, driving innovation and sustainable development in our region and beyond.
visionContent.text2: We envision a future where our graduates lead positive change in their communities, industries, and the world through knowledge, innovation, and ethical leadership.

valuesContent.title: Our Values
valuesContent.text1: Our core values guide everything we do and shape our university culture.
valuesContent.text2: These principles define who we are and how we work together to achieve our mission.

goalsContent.title: Strategic Goals
goalsContent.text1: Our strategic roadmap for achieving excellence and making a lasting impact.
goalsContent.text2: We have set ambitious yet achievable goals to guide our development over the coming years.

value1.title: Excellence
value1.description: We strive for the highest standards in education, research, and all aspects of university life.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.description: We embrace creativity and new ideas to solve complex challenges and drive progress.

value3.title: Integrity
value3.description: We act with honesty, fairness, and ethical principles in all our endeavors.

value4.title: Collaboration
value4.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnerships to achieve greater impact.

value5.title: Diversity
value5.description: We celebrate different perspectives and create an inclusive environment for all.

value6.title: Responsibility
value6.description: We are committed to sustainable development and social responsibility.

academicGoals.title: Academic Excellence
academicGoals.item1: Develop innovative curriculum aligned with industry needs
academicGoals.item2: Enhance teaching quality and student support services
academicGoals.item3: Expand interdisciplinary programs and research opportunities

researchGoals.title: Research Innovation
researchGoals.item1: Establish world-class research centers and laboratories
researchGoals.item2: Increase research funding and publication output

internationalGoals.title: Global Engagement
internationalGoals.item1: Expand international partnerships and exchange programs
internationalGoals.item2: Increase international student enrollment and diversity
internationalGoals.item3: Participate in global research networks and conferences

communityGoals.title: Community Impact
communityGoals.item1: Develop community outreach and social responsibility programs
communityGoals.item3: Promote lifelong learning and professional development

about.title: About the Faculty
about.description1: Salymbekov University is a higher education institution with modern clinical bases equipped with innovative medical equipment, modern material and technical base and highly competitive staff, including those with higher medical education, work experience and fluent English. The university is an international educational institution providing education for local and foreign students.
about.description2: Medical education is provided by the Higher School of Medicine. Classes include practice as well as theoretical and humanitarian disciplines. Practical classes and lectures are held in classrooms equipped with modern educational and medical equipment.

staff.title: Staff and Teachers
staff.description1: The main task of the university is to satisfy the market of educational services, ensure the export of knowledge and implement the program of successful introduction of multilingual education in the Kyrgyz Republic. The best teachers and leading specialists of our country are involved in the educational process. Training is conducted by highly qualified teachers, including more than 20 doctors and candidates of sciences. The main educational programs are created in accordance with the requirements of state educational standards.
staff.description2: The duration of study is 6 years for citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic, 5 years for foreign students. After graduation, the graduate is awarded the qualification 'Doctor'.

facilities.title: Educational Base
facilities.description1: The Higher School of Medicine has created and provided all conditions for educational and practical activities, as well as sports. Practical classrooms are equipped with visual aids, models of body parts and organs, mannequins and dummies.
facilities.description2: Laboratories and classrooms are equipped with multimedia equipment to expand learning opportunities:
facilities.description3: The database of educational programs and the library fund are replenished with printed and electronic publications of each student through access. Industrial practices are the most important part of personnel training in the healthcare system and an integral part of the educational process. The main goal of the practice is to acquire and improve practical knowledge and skills in patient care, diagnosis and medical care for future doctors, to familiarize themselves with the organization and working conditions of doctors in hospitals and medical centers.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The main value and guarantors of stable development for the university are the teaching staff, employees and students. Teachers are the most important link in personnel training, since the teacher's qualifications, his pedagogical competence, working and living conditions, human and moral qualities play a key role in the training of highly qualified medical specialists.

policy.title: University Policy
policy.description1: The university adheres to the policy of providing quality education, all efforts are aimed at creating a leading educational institution that will be recognized as a leader among higher educational institutions of the Kyrgyz Republic.
policy.description2: We firmly believe that the set goals and objectives will be implemented through the implementation of the educational program and the active development of international relations. The faculty, as an open educational structure of the university, develops comprehensive international partnerships with other universities, government agencies and the public. The process of integration of the faculty, as well as the university itself, into the world educational space is developing through participation in various international scientific and educational programs.

hero.title: International College of IT and Business

itBusinessCollege.invitationText: ¬´Salymbekov University¬ª and ¬´Lincoln University¬ª of Malaysia invite applicants to the International College of IT and Business to gain knowledge in programming.
itBusinessCollege.mainImageAlt: International College of IT and Business
itBusinessCollege.description1: International College of IT and Business offers modern education in the field of information technology and business.
itBusinessCollege.description2: We train specialists in demand in the modern labor market, with relevant knowledge and practical skills.
itBusinessCollege.description3: Our educational programs are developed taking into account the requirements of modern IT companies and business structures.
itBusinessCollege.admissionText: We accept applicants on the basis of 9th and 11th grades.

businessSchool.description1: Founder of the Business School - Askars Maatkabylovich Salymbekov with graduates of 'Young Leaders of Kyrgyzstan'
businessSchool.description2: Salymbekov Business School is a unique educational center providing modern additional education to all segments of the population through its own public schools and special courses conducted according to a specially developed curriculum with a unique methodology of comprehensive trainings and motivational classes.
businessSchool.description3: Our unique educational projects, which have no analogues in the Kyrgyz Republic, were specially developed to cultivate a new generation of the country educated according to modern standards, where everyone could perfectly master three or more languages.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description1: The mission of the school is to provide quality services in five main areas that cover preschool education, elementary school students, middle and high school students, students and youth, as well as those who strive to learn foreign languages in a short period of time.
mission.description2: We can proudly say that our educational projects have stood the test of time and have helped thousands of our citizens to receive education in demand in the modern world. Our pupils and graduates have achieved great success in entrepreneurship, production, creativity, science, show business, etc.

founder.description1: Askars Maatkabylovich Salymbekov ‚Äì founder, public figure and philanthropist, honorary president of the Dordoi Association, founder of the Public Foundation 'Askar Salymbekov Foundation' for the implementation of educational, scientific, charitable, patriotic and environmental projects that have a great positive impact on the younger generation and youth.
founder.description2: In 2019, on his initiative, the Salymbekov University Institution was established, the main goal of which is to provide quality education using international technologies and standards for both citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic and foreign citizens. An important factor in the creation of the University was the need to create a common platform to unite all projects and created events into a single center for more effective management and control, as well as for the possibility of introducing quality affordable education for all categories of citizens.
founder.description3: Askar Salymbekov constantly provides financial assistance and support to socially vulnerable segments of the population, medical and social institutions, athletes, students, cultural and art figures, including by allocating funds to socially vulnerable segments of the population, contributing to the creation of feature and documentary films, publishing books and monographs, organizing archaeological excavations, training gifted students, reconstructing and restoring important historical buildings and structures in the country.

biography.title: Biography
biography.birthPlaceValue: At-Bashi village, At-Bashi district, Naryn region, Kirghiz SSR.
biography.educationDetails1: in 1977 graduated from the Faculty of History,
biography.educationDetails2: in 1990 ‚Äì Faculty of Economics ‚Äì 'Accounting, Audit and Control'

awards.title: State and other awards:
awards.item2: Order of the Russian Federation 'Honorary Citizen of Russia';
awards.item3: Order of the International Assembly of Capitals and Major Cities 'For Contribution to Sustainable Development of CIS Cities';
awards.item5: Gold medal of Russian economist V. Leontiev;
awards.item6: Honorary Diploma of the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan;
awards.item7: Honored Worker of Local Self-Government of the Kyrgyz Republic;

workExperience.title: Work experience:
workExperience.item1: 1977-79 - Secretary of the Komsomol Committee of the Kyrgyz State Institute of Physical Culture.
workExperience.item2: 1979-81 - Secretary of the Komsomol Committee of the Kyrgyz State Medical Institute.
workExperience.item3: 1981-86 - Head of the Department of the Central Committee of the Komsomol of Kyrgyzstan.
workExperience.item4: 1986-91 - Chairman of the Frunze City Sports Committee.
workExperience.item5: 1991-93 - Head of the Market Department of the Frunze City Executive Committee.
workExperience.item7: 1999-2005 - Head of the State Administration of Naryn Region of the Kyrgyz Republic - Governor.
workExperience.item9: 2005-2010 - Deputy of the Jogorku Kenesh of the III and IV convocations.
workExperience.item10: 2010 - present - President of the Dordoi Association.

publicActivity.title: Public activity:
publicActivity.item1: Honorary Consul of Brazil in the Kyrgyz Republic,
publicActivity.item2: Honorary President of the Kok-Boru Federation of Kyrgyzstan,
publicActivity.item3: Vice-President of the Football Federation of the Kyrgyz Republic,
publicActivity.item4: Co-Chairman of the International Charitable Foundation 'Aykoldyk'.

president.description1: Since its opening, the Salymbekov University Institution has strictly followed the principles of education quality, accessibility and maintaining education standards in accordance with international standards. The university is a multipurpose educational complex that includes innovative buildings in Bishkek and business schools in all regions of Kyrgyzstan.
president.description2: The main areas of the University's activity are the development of medical education, IT direction and the development of tourism and economics. As part of the policy being implemented, the International Faculty of Medicine was founded in 2019, which includes 2 departments.
president.description3: The university has modern infrastructure for quality student education. All classrooms of the academic building are equipped with multimedia auditoriums, medical laboratories with the latest equipment, convenient points for independent work and meals.
president.description4: All conditions have been created for quality education and comfortable living of students. The developed clinical base of the University is a special pride, since the practical approach in medicine is the foundation of educational activities.
president.description5: The university pays serious attention to the development of international activities. Joint educational programs with foreign partner universities are being implemented, and projects for students and teachers are regularly organized.
president.description6: The university is open to everyone! Our doors are open for applicants, students and future colleagues!

rector.description1: I am glad to welcome you to Salymbekov University, one of the most innovative and promising projects of the Askar Salymbekov Foundation, aimed at further development and improvement of the education system in the Kyrgyz Republic.
rector.description2: Salymbekov University is an accredited innovative educational institution providing quality education in the field of IT, medicine, business, personal growth and leadership development. Founded in 2019 as a continuation of the educational activities of the Askar Salymbekov Foundation, Salymbekov University has all the material, technical and human resources to train qualified specialists in the field of IT, business and medicine.
rector.description3: Salymbekov University is an internationally recognized educational institution included in the list of the World Health Organization (WDOMS), FAIMER Association, having Sponsor Notes from the international organization ECFMG and international accreditation based on the standards of the World Federation of Medical Education. The university is a member of the Association of Higher Educational Institutions and the Association of Creative Industries of Kyrgyzstan, as well as the International Modern Medical Academy of Sciences. The university is included in the limited list of universities that have access to Research for Life, SAGE and DeGruyter databases with access to electronic resources with more than 198,000 books and journals on medical and related topics.
rector.description4: Since its foundation, the university's international cooperation with leading universities and clinics in Germany, Turkey, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, India, Pakistan, Russia, Ukraine, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan has been actively developing. Together with foreign partners, international scientific and practical conferences, master classes, lectures, seminars, academic mobility and professional development programs are organized annually with the involvement of the best foreign and domestic specialists.
rector.description5: Today, the International Faculty of Medicine, the International College of IT and Business, and the Salymbekov Business School with regional branches throughout the republic are successfully operating at the University.

externalRelations.title: Vice-Rector for External Relations and Development
externalRelations.description: Kazakov Avaz Asanovich ‚Äì Vice-Rector for External Relations and Development.

accreditation.mainText: Salymbekov University is an accredited higher education institution providing quality higher education in accordance with international standards.
accreditation.description: In 2021, Salymbekov University was recognized as an accredited higher education institution based on the results of accreditation in the independent Agency for Accreditation of Educational Programs and Associations (AAOPA).

internationalAccreditation.description: Salymbekov University is a higher education institution providing quality education in the fields of medicine, IT, and business in accordance with international standards. The university is an internationally accredited educational institution recognized by international organizations (WFME, FAIMER, ECFMG).
internationalAccreditation.certificateAlt: Salymbekov University International Institutional Accreditation Certificate

programAccreditation.description: Salymbekov University is a higher education institution providing quality education in the fields of medicine, IT, and business in accordance with international standards. The university is an internationally accredited educational institution recognized by international organizations (WFME, FAIMER, ECFMG).
programAccreditation.certificateAlt: Salymbekov University International Program Accreditation Certificate

section1.title: + Section 1. General Provisions
section1.content:
1. The University is established and operates for the purpose of conducting educational activities in the field of preschool education, primary, basic and secondary general education, primary, secondary, higher, postgraduate and additional professional education.
2. The University conducts fundamental and applied scientific research, experimental development, conducts research, development and technological work, carries out innovative and scientific-technical activities, expert, advisory and analytical work and services, and conducts personnel training.
3. To achieve its statutory goals and objectives, the University may engage in commercial and other types of activities in accordance with the current legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic and this Charter.
4. The University is independent in carrying out the types of activities specified in this Charter, developing and adopting local regulatory acts, and determining directions of international cooperation.

section2.title: + Section 2. Types and Directions of University Activities
section2.content:
The University aims to develop education, science and culture. It meets the needs of individuals and the state for quality education and specialist training, implements programs at all levels - from preschool to postgraduate, introduces innovations, develops scientific research and international cooperation.
The University also carries out a wide range of educational, scientific, cultural, innovative, entrepreneurial and other types of activities permitted by law.
All areas of work are regulated by the charter, laws of the Kyrgyz Republic and require licensing if provided by law.

Article 1. Goals of the University's Activities
1.1. Main Goals

Meeting the individual's needs for intellectual, creative, spiritual-moral and professional development.

Providing society and the state with qualified personnel with higher and secondary professional education.

Implementation of educational programs in preschool, general, professional, higher and additional education in accordance with state standards and accreditation requirements.

Introduction of modern and innovative educational technologies and programs.

Integration of education and science into the international scientific and educational space.

Development of scientific research and cooperation with industrial and scientific organizations.

Preservation and enhancement of cultural, moral and scientific values of society.

Promoting innovative and sustainable development of the country through scientific, analytical and economic activities.

Article 2. Main Types of University Activities
2.1. Educational Activities

Training of personnel in all forms of education and levels of education.

Teaching and upbringing according to general education and additional programs.

Implementation of additional general education programs, special courses, tutoring (including individual).

Implementation of shortened and accelerated programs for obtaining second education.

Training of specialists based on licenses from other universities, including foreign ones.

Retraining and advanced training of specialists.

Creating conditions for preparing dissertations for candidate and doctor of sciences degrees (including PhD).

Development and implementation of educational programs with issuance of certificates.

2.2. Scientific and Methodological Activities

Publishing educational and scientific materials.

Conducting fundamental and applied research, development and expert work.

International cooperation in the field of education, science and innovation.

Publishing monographs, textbooks and manuals.

Formation of a modern material and technical base for scientific work.

2.3. Organizational and Structural Activities

Creation of University divisions in the country and abroad.

Implementation of other types of activities corresponding to statutory tasks.

Article 3. Additional Types of Activities (non-core)
3.1. Creation of Infrastructure Facilities

Institutes, centers, laboratories, technoparks, workshops, publishing houses, theaters, museums, sports centers, dormitories, etc.

3.2. Paid Services

Advertising, consulting, scientific, translation, design, publishing, legal, medical and others.

3.3. Production Activities

Equipment repair, technical testing, modernization.

Production of products for university needs and third-party organizations.

Trade in goods (educational materials, equipment, furniture, etc.).

3.4. Social, Cultural and Sports Activities

Catering, dormitories, hotels, sanatoriums, camps, excursions, tourism.

Cultural events: concerts, performances, exhibitions, competitions.

3.5. Financial and Innovation Activities

Purchase of securities, placement of funds on deposits.

Management of rights to results of intellectual activity.

Implementation of innovative projects.

Leasing of property.

3.6. International Cooperation

Direct links with foreign educational organizations.

Organization of internships, practices, educational trips.

Article 4. Licensing and Legal Capacity

Activities requiring a license are carried out only after obtaining it.

Termination of the license entails termination of this type of activity.

The University has the right to hire domestic and foreign specialists.

Income-generating activities are allowed only if they serve statutory goals.

Article 5. Main Directions of Educational Activities
5.1. Main Educational Programs

General education programs - preschool, primary, basic, secondary.

Vocational training programs for workers and employees.

Primary vocational education programs.

Secondary vocational education programs.

Higher education programs - bachelor's, specialist, master's.

Postgraduate education programs - postgraduate, doctoral studies, etc.

5.2. Additional Educational Programs

General development and pre-professional programs.

Professional development and retraining programs.

5.3. Funding and Study Conditions

All types of educational services are provided on a paid basis under contracts.

The cost is determined by the University's estimate.

Benefits are possible for gifted students, orphans and students from low-income families.

5.4. Education Standards

The educational process is built according to state standards.

The development of the student's personality and a humanistic approach are ensured.

5.5. Right to Carry Out Educational Activities

The University implements all programs if it has the appropriate license.
